section01.title: TRAINING
section01.content:
Register for Training
Emerge as a Blockchain leader with our online and offline training designed using an industry-first approach and get certified. Register now and join the priority queue.
Request a Master Class
Want to organize a master class in your neighbourhood or university? Contact us at in@ibcol.org
Register for Training
Want to stay updated? Follow us on Linkedin, Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.

section02.title: MENTORSHIP
section02.desc: Engage with the community and tune in with changemakers (contestants, trainers, and mentors) across the country at https://forum.zubi.io

section04.title: COMPETITION
section04.contentHTML: The HK-BCOL Finals is held 13 June 2020 at the City University of Hong Kong.
